item.title: Otsi.mk2
item.description: Otsi is a cute axolotl that is also your personal companion. All in a compact form so you can keep her with you all the time.

item.title: Cition portable mk2
item.description: Have you ever wanted to have a portable workstation straight from movies? Me too, that’s why I have made this - a portable workstation enclosed in durable Pelican Case
